events_list.title: Guest Seminar: Nucleation in Porous Media
events_list.preview: Dr. Smith from MIT joins us to discuss novel approaches to controlling nucleation rates in confined spaces.

body.lead_text: Join us for a special seminar featuring Dr. John Smith, a leading expert in nanoconfined crystallization.

content_blocks.content: Dr. Smith will present his latest findings on how pore size distribution affects polymorphic selection in organic crystals. This talk is highly relevant for students working on zeolite synthesis.

events_list.title: Workshop: Intro to Molecular Dynamics
events_list.preview: A full-day hands-on workshop covering the basics of GROMACS and LAMMPS for crystallization studies.

body.full_title: Hands-on Workshop: Molecular Dynamics for Beginners
body.lead_text: Learn how to set up, run, and analyze MD simulations using the center's high-performance computing cluster.

content_blocks.content: This workshop is mandatory for all new graduate students but open to undergraduates interested in computational chemistry.

events_list.title: PhD Defense: Sarah Jones
events_list.preview: Sarah Jones will defend her dissertation titled 'Chiral Resolution of Amino Acids via Viedma Ripening'.

body.lead_text: The Faculty of the Welch Center invites you to the doctoral defense of Sarah Jones.

content_blocks.content: Sarah's research focuses on the mechanics of attrition-enhanced deracemization. She has successfully demonstrated the rapid conversion of racemic glycine mixtures into single enantiomers using glass beads.
Sarah's work provides a scalable pathway for producing pure chiral pharmaceuticals.
content_blocks.author: Dr. Peter Rimer, Advisor

events_list.title: Annual Center Holiday Mixer
events_list.preview: Celebrate a successful year of research with faculty, students, and our industry partners. Food and drinks provided.

body.lead_text: It's time to unwind! Join us for an evening of networking, awards, and celebration as we close out the Fall 2025 semester.

content_blocks.content: We will be presenting the 'Student of the Year' and 'Publication of the Year' awards at 6:30 PM. Industry representatives from ExxonMobil and Dow Chemical will also be in attendance.

events_list.title: Gulf Coast Crystallization Symposium 2026
events_list.preview: A premier regional conference bringing together crystallographers from Texas, Louisiana, and Mexico.

body.lead_text: Registration is now open for the largest gathering of materials scientists in the Gulf Coast region.

content_blocks.content: This year's theme is 'Sustainable Separation Processes.' We are accepting abstracts for oral and poster presentations until December 31st, 2025.
Students are encouraged to apply for travel grants. Visit the main symposium website to register.

events_list.title: Advanced XRD Analysis Workshop
events_list.preview: Master the art of Rietveld refinement and phase identification using HighScore Plus software.

body.full_title: Technical Workshop: Advanced Powder X-Ray Diffraction
body.lead_text: Go beyond basic peak matching. This workshop covers quantitative phase analysis and crystal structure refinement.

content_blocks.content: Participants should bring their own laptops with the demo software pre-installed. Sample data sets will be provided.

content_blocks.title: What You Will Learn
items: Sample preparation techniques to minimize preferred orientation.
Introduction to Rietveld Refinement for quantitative analysis.
